Updates

Stay in the know

Letter 2.1

Sync photos from other platforms - This version will allow you to manually sync your photos from Dropbox, iCloud, Google Drive, and more using the new option in the import menu.Click here to download

Fixes

21 Feb 2019
  • - Bold, italic, and strikethrough shortcuts work on selections.
  • - You can now use /checkbox to create To-Do blocks.
  • - Fixed a bug where push notifications randomly stop working in the iOS app. ðŸ˜…
  • - Added Window > Maximize to the desktop system menu so you can find windows that are rendered.
